metadata.title: CVE-2024-43836 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: ethtool: pse-pd: Fix possible null-derefFix a possible null dereference when a PSE supports both c33 and PoDL, butonly one of the netlink attributes is specified. The c33 or PoDL PSEcapabilities are already validated in the ethnl_set_pse_validate() call.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
